vlive.korean: [당연하지 즉석에서 한 거라기엔 너무 완벽했으니까!] 왜? [But it was too perfect for something that was improvised] Why? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [IZ*ONE] 엄지 검지가 N극 S극이라도 오케이라구요❣️ (CHAE YEON talking about a episode with CHAE RYEONG)

examples.korean: clothes that are the epitome of good taste 발음듣기 세련미의 완벽한 본보기가 되는 옷 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: clothes that are the epitome of good taste 발음

examples.korean: He played the shot with consummate skill. 발음듣기 그는 완벽한 기교를 발휘하며 그 슈팅을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He played the shot with consummate skill. 발음

examples.korean: To all outward appearances they were perfectly happy. 발음듣기 외형상으로는 어느 모로 보아도 그들은 완벽하게 행복했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: To all outward appearances they were perfectly happy. 발음

examples.korean: The landscape had a stark, unworldly beauty. 발음듣기 그 풍경은 완벽한 천상의 아름다움을 지니고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The landscape had a stark, unworldly beauty. 발음

examples.korean: Sport became the perfect outlet for his aggression. 발음듣기 스포츠는 그의 공격성을 배출할 완벽한 수단이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sport became the perfect outlet for his aggression. 발음
